Text: FW Happy HolidaysStan I wish you the best over the holidays and long into the future Thank you for taking the time to attend the Christmas party and to visit with the staff in the Maitland office Im forever impressed by the priority you place on meeting with the field locations The fact that you were able to do so during this difficult time is commendable Were rooting for your success at turning things around Thank you Mike Original Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Stan Horton Chairman and CEO of Enron Global NRON Sent Wednesday December PM To Enron Global Services NRON Subject Happy Holidays With the Holidays upon us I want to take this opportunity to thank you for your contributions to our company I appreciate your continued dedication These are challenging times at Enron and once again the employees of Enron Global Services and Enron Transportation Services continue to set the standard for excellence Thank you Best wishes for a Happy Holiday and a safe and prosperous Stan
